about_the_game:
You wake up alone in a mysterious desert & your task is finding out what happened!
To do that you will build A base, craft better Tools & explore a vast desert landscape
consisting of various unique biomes, that come with their own challenges & rewards!
On the Journey through the desert you will encounter many different threats
such as sandstorms, droughts & dangerous enemies,
but as you'll find out there is something way darker & more sinister plagueing the desert!

Find a Place to cool down



It's best to find somewhere chill during a hot day in the desert. The Scorching heat might
make you feel dizzy or disoriented but don't worry you will find an Oasis along your way!
An Oasis is the perfect spot for settling down in the desert, as it does provide the most
essential resource, water. On top of that you might even make new friends as an Oasis
always remains the favourite spot for friendly desert camels eager to join your journey

Explore a mysterious desert landscape




Explore and surive in a vast 64^2km desert landscape composed of various unique and
beautiful biomes, each with their own challenges! You might find yourself walking across the
sand dunes or stopping and taking a good look at the beautiful scenery of a massive canyon.
Maybe you even find one of the old temples or long-forgotten cities of an ancient civilization.

Key Features:

  • Massive 64km^2 Map to explore & uncover
    7 Unique Biomes, each with their own challenges & rewards

  • Advanced Building & Realistic Farming System to create your own unique home

  • Adaptive ai enemies learning from your every move & mistake
    Various Frightning Creatures like the feared Serpamat trying to ruin your day

  • Dynamic Weather Effects like Sandstorms & Droughts pushing you to your limits

  • Curious Desert Camels that can be tamed & prove useful during longer journeys

  • Ancient & Exciting Storyline making you question your existance

Can you survive the Scorching Desert?
